summary: After coming home from a Party gathering one night, a Czech official becomes convinced that he is about to be the subject of a political purge and tries to do damage control, while also dealing with his turbulent marriage.
cast: Jirina Bohdalová|Radoslav Brzobohatý|Gustav Opocenský|Miroslav Holub|Lubor Tokos|Borivoj Navrátil|Jirí Císler|Jaroslav Moucka|Karel Vasicek|Ladislav Krivácek|Frantisek Nemec|Jan Teplý|Josef Sulc|Bronislav Poloczek|Alois Mottl|Ladislav Krecmer|Jindrich Narenta|Karel Vlcek|Ivan Palúch|Daniela Pokorná|Galina Kopaneva|Milica Kolofiková|Alice Auspergerová|Jan Bartos|Jana Hana Duffková|Zdenek Hradilák|Hynek Kubasta
title: La oreja
